titleStmt.title: The golden-groue moralized in three bookes: a worke very necessary for all such, as would know how to gouerne themselues, their houses, or their countrey. Made by W. Vaughan, Master of Artes, and student in the ciuill law,
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, William, 1577-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling on Adling hill,

notesStmt.note: With two final leaves of verse to the author.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
